title: Sidewall, 1800–50
medium: Block-printed on handmade or machine-made paper
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Octagon medallion, with inner band of acanthus wrapped rod, and center band of palmettes. These medallions are separated by smaller foliate and floral medallions. Printed in light gray on whoite ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1800–50.
1800–50. Block-printed on handmade or machine-made paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-171.
